title: Yuying Lu
text:
PhD Student
Biostatistics @ Columbia University






I am a second-year PhD student in Biostatistics at Columbia University.
My research interests lie at the intersection of machine learning, statistics, and optimization. I am particularly interested in causal inference and statistical machine learning applications in EHR.
Please feel free to reach out via email for collaboration!

title: Yuying Lu
text:
About My Research
I focus on developing robust statistical methods for complex data. Currently, I am working on:

Causal Inference: Methods for observational studies.
Generative Models: Applications of diffusion models in EHR data.
Optimization: Theory behind non-convex optimization in deep learning.
